anniversary.description: The first Lithuanian-language book, the Catechism of Martynas Mažvydas, is published in Königsberg.[6]

app.app_title: The First Words: Lithuania's Literary Birth
app.description: Explore the fascinating story of the first Lithuanian book and its impact on language preservation
